welcome.title: Welcome to Airport Squash
welcome.description: Discover first-class squash in a modern and inviting environment

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: Since 2015, we have been your trusted partner for squash and fitness.
history.paragraph2: With state-of-the-art equipment and experienced coaches, we offer the best squash experience.
history.paragraph3: Our community is constantly growing, and we are proud to connect people through sport.

community.title: Community
community.description: A place for meeting and sport

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: Your health is our top priority

join.title: Join Our Community
join.description: Experience squash at the highest level

booking.title: Online Booking
booking.description: Book your court easily and quickly
booking.bookingInstructions: Follow these simple steps to book your court

student.title: Urban Sports Club Membership
student.feature1: Membership S: 4 visits per month, for fitness training only, no squash sessions
student.feature2: Membership M: 8 visits per month, up to 4 squash sessions of 45 minutes
student.feature3: Memberships L and XL: 8 visits per month, up to 8 squash sessions of 45 minutes

holidayHours.title: Holidays
holidayHours.description: We are closed on the following holidays

success.title: Message Sent!
success.message: Thank you for your message. We will get back to you shortly.

errors.name: Please enter your name
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.subject: Please select a subject

directions.title: Directions
directions.public: By public transport: U7 subway to Kurt-Schumacher-Platz

events.title: Events & Community
events.communityDescription: At Airport Squash & Fitness, we believe in building a strong, inclusive community through sport. Our regular events are suitable for all ages and skill levels, offering opportunities to learn, connect, and play squash together.

social.title: Airport Evening Social
social.description: Join our Sunday squash social event! Perfect for meeting other players, enjoying friendly matches, and building our community. All skill levels welcome.

youth.title: Youth Training
youth.description: Special training sessions for young players aged 8-16. Professional coaching in a fun, supportive environment. Equipment provided for beginners.

inclusive.title: LGBTQIA+ Inclusive Training
inclusive.description: A welcoming space for the LGBTQIA+ community to learn and play squash. Open to all skill levels, with a focus on inclusivity and fun.

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.description: Would you like to participate in our community events or learn more about our programs? Contact us or visit us during one of our events - we look forward to welcoming you to our squash family!

shop.title: Online Shop
shop.description: Discover our range of squash equipment and accessories

fitness.title: Fitness Center
fitness.description: Transform body and mind in our state-of-the-art fitness facility

welcome.title: Welcome to Airport Fitness
welcome.description: Our fitness center offers a variety of activities and equipment to help you achieve your fitness goals. Whether you're just starting your fitness journey or want to take your training to the next level, our experienced trainers and modern equipment will support you.

general.title: General Training
general.description: Our fully equipped gym offers modern cardio machines, free weights, and strength training areas. Perfect for beginners and experienced athletes.

kickboxing.title: Kickboxing
kickboxing.description: Intense kickboxing classes combining combat techniques with cardio. Improve your strength, agility, and self-confidence.

circuit.title: Circuit Training
circuit.description: Dynamic group workouts targeting all major muscle groups. Our circuit training sessions are designed to boost endurance and burn calories.

trial.title: Try a Free Session
trial.description: Experience our fitness center firsthand with a free trial session. Our trainers will help you discover the perfect activities for your fitness goals.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: The protection of your personal data is very important to us

declaration.title: Privacy Policy
declaration.content: This privacy policy informs you about the nature, scope, and purpose of the processing of personal data within our online offering.

responsible.title: Responsible Party
responsible.content:
Airport Squash & Fitness
Rue Charles Calmette 11D
13405 Berlin
Germany

collection.title: Data Collection
collection.content: We collect and process personal data only within the framework of applicable data protection laws. This includes name, contact details, and booking information.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to information, rectification, erasure, and restriction of the processing of your personal data.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: Please read these terms and conditions carefully

general.title: General Terms and Conditions
general.content: These terms and conditions govern the contractual relationship between Airport Squash & Fitness and our customers.

membership.title: Membership
membership.content: Membership is personal and non-transferable. The minimum term is 1 month.

bookings.title: Bookings & Cancellations
bookings.content: Bookings can be canceled free of charge up to 24 hours before the game starts. A 50% fee will be charged for later cancellations.

rules.title: House Rules
rules.content: All members are required to comply with the house rules. These are posted on the premises.
